Package BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class PortBESA

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.PortBESA
public class PortBESA extends Object
This class represents a port BESA, which makes treatment of behaviors, guards and events.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana
